article.title: Icad Radiology Technology Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Icad Incorporated, Nashua, New Hampshire, was issued a contract modification. The award is a fixed-price with economic price adjustment contract with a maximum $12 million for various radiology systems, subsystems, and components.Â There are no other locations of performance. The Defense Logistics Agency Troop Support, Philadelphia, Pennsylvaniua, is the contracting activity.
